title: Has there been any new developments inreplacing the drawbridge going on to Topsail Island? We\'re hearing rumors about a new span bridge being built.
text:
Currently, the plan is to hold additional meetings this fall to
decide on an alternative, with selection of a final plan in 2012 for
construction by 2015.



Here's a link with some details:

http://www.ncdot.gov/projects/TopsailIslandBridge/
